/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/cpm.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cpm.dir/dt.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cpm.dir/OpticalFlow.cpp.o  -o cpm -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_features2d.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_flann.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_ml.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videoio.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgcodecs.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.3.2.0 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.so.3.2.0
